text: jo koee allaah ke maarg mein gharabaar chhodakar nikalega, vah dharatee mein sharan lene kee bahut jagah aur samaee paega, aur jo koee apane ghar mein sab kuchh chhodakar allaah aur usake rasool kee or nikale aur usakee mrtyu ho jae, to usaka pratidaan allaah ke zimme ho gaya. allaah bahut kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
